column4: What package do I need to install in order to enable the 'extra' visual effects? (it tells me that the composite extensions is not enabled)
they were enabled when I ran from the cd
did you enable the restricted driver somehow?
fglrx (the restricted driver) doesn't support AIGLX, so you'd have to use Xgl
What driver should I use then?
the default "ati" driver, which is what you were using on the livecd and is what you'll get if you disable the restricted driver
